verbs.description: In [ARG1: a video] [V: published] [ARGM-LOC: on the White House 's official Instagram page] , various members of the Trump administration and White House staff weigh in on the viral internet argument . They take the opportunity to poke fun at themselves , and work in a few jabs while they 're at it .
